General.Name: Sub Sri Thai Public Company Limited
General.Description: Sub Sri Thai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the food and beverage, warehouse and wharf, and garment businesses in Thailand and internationally. The company's Food and Beverage segment produces and distributes snacks, drinks, and ice cream, as well as operates restaurants. Its Warehouse and Wharf segment offers document and electronic media storage, wharf, and warehouse rental services. The company's Garment segment produces and distributes clothing and leather products. The company also engages in the trust fund management business. Sub Sri Thai Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
